key_quotes: I'm looking to – we're in the name activity screen. If you could log in. I'm just looking to add some couple of things to the activity screen, if you can help us with.
Oh, it's not? That one is not. Yeah, just like your name search results name roll-up layout, but the name activity search is not customizable.
So if there's new name activity, we're not always able to see what it's showing, which is the name, the date of time of the activity, and the company.

qa_pairs.question: Can you log into the admin account for us?
qa_pairs.answer: So you're not the name layout, but the activity screen?

qa_pairs.question: Is it when you're writing an activity, or is it like an activity search?
qa_pairs.answer: Right. So, yeah. So at the bottom of the, you know, when you're, if you go to MyPCR, and on the bottom left, it has name activities, and you click on name activities, and then the toolbar across the top has name, date, company, want to see, want to be able to add location as well.

qa_pairs.question: Oh, it's not? That one is not?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah, just like your name search results name roll-up layout, but the name activity search is not customizable.
